leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 闭环科研-主动学习/贝叶斯优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 设计→执行→更新→再设计→评测

unit.unit_name: BO/AL 核心库与策略集合

tools.name: EvoloPy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for classical and recent nature-inspired metaheuristic optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox that provides a wide range of classical and nature-inspired metaheuristic algorithms for global optimization problems, facilitating comparative studies and application to scientific optimization tasks.

tools.name: AI4SIM model-collection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning surrogate models for physical processes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyTorch Lightning pipelines and models designed to act as surrogates for various physical processes, enabling accelerated simulation and analysis in scientific use-cases.

tools.name: LE-PDE-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for PDE surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A framework that endows deep learning-based surrogate models with robust and efficient uncertainty quantification capabilities, specifically tailored for forward and inverse partial differential equation (PDE) problems.

tools.name: BayesNewton
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian process library in JAX using Newton's method
tools.detailed_description: A Gaussian process library built on JAX that provides a unifying view of approximate Bayesian inference as variants of Newton's method, enabling efficient probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: kalman-jax
tools.one_line_profile: Approximate inference for Markov Gaussian processes in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing approximate inference in Markov Gaussian processes using iterated Kalman smoothing, implemented in JAX for high-performance probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: ExpensiveOptimBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for surrogate-based optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed for evaluating surrogate-based optimization algorithms on expensive black-box functions, facilitating the comparison and development of optimization strategies.

tools.name: ParBayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelizable Bayesian Optimization in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing Bayesian Optimization with support for parallel execution, enabling efficient hyperparameter tuning and optimization of expensive functions.

tools.name: Axelrod
tools.one_line_profile: Research tool for the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for conducting research on the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma, providing a framework to create tournaments and analyze strategies in evolutionary game theory.

tools.name: PlatEMO
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary multi-objective optimization platform
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based platform for evolutionary multi-objective optimization, providing a comprehensive collection of algorithms and test problems for research and application.

tools.name: VOPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Black-box Vector Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for black-box vector optimization problems, providing tools and algorithms to handle multi-objective optimization tasks where gradients are unavailable.

tools.name: BatchBALD
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient and Diverse Batch Acquisition for Deep Bayesian Active Learning
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing the BatchBALD acquisition function for deep Bayesian active learning, enabling efficient selection of informative and diverse data batches for labeling.

tools.name: SoftMC
tools.one_line_profile: FPGA-based memory controller infrastructure for DRAM studies
tools.detailed_description: An FPGA-based memory controller design and API that enables researchers to develop and execute custom tests for DRAM modules, facilitating experimental studies on memory reliability and performance.

tools.name: TransOPT
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer Optimization System for Black-box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A system designed for transfer optimization in black-box settings, allowing the leverage of knowledge from previous optimization tasks to accelerate new ones.

tools.name: pykoi
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for Active Learning and RLHF
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a unified interface for active learning and Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF), facilitating the fine-tuning of large language models and other transformers.

tools.name: GPR
tools.one_line_profile: Basic Gaussian process regression library in C++
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++ library for Gaussian process regression that depends on Eigen3, suitable for embedding in high-performance scientific applications requiring probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: FielDHub
tools.one_line_profile: Design of Experiments (DOE) application for agriculture and biology
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny application designed to aid in the creation of traditional, unreplicated, augmented, and partially replicated designs for agricultural, plant breeding, and biological experiments.

tools.name: gh-design-space-exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Grasshopper tools for design space exploration and multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Grasshopper tools supporting visual, performance-based design space exploration and interactive multi-objective optimization (MOO) for conceptual design in engineering and architecture.

tools.name: evoxbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evolutionary algorithms in Neural Architecture Search
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite that transforms Neural Architecture Search (NAS) into multi-objective optimization problems to test and evaluate evolutionary algorithms.

tools.name: MetaDE
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated evolutionary framework for Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A framework supporting both JAX and PyTorch that optimizes Differential Evolution (DE) strategies via meta-level evolution, designed for efficient large-scale black-box optimization.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolbox offering methods for decision making, uncertainty quantification, and statistical emulation, including multi-fidelity modeling, experimental design, and Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: Tome
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor for optimal growth temperature of microorganisms
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning model and tool for predicting the optimal growth temperature of microorganisms and enzyme catalytic optima from sequence data.

tools.name: ReBATE
tools.one_line_profile: Relief-based feature selection algorithms library
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Relief-based feature selection algorithms (ReliefF, SURF, etc.) optimized with Cython, useful for bioinformatics and data mining tasks.

tools.name: PyPop7
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for population-based black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python library implementing a wide range of population-based black-box optimization (BBO) algorithms, focusing on large-scale variants from evolutionary computation and swarm intelligence.

tools.name: BrazilMet
tools.one_line_profile: R package for Brazilian meteorological data processing
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the acquisition, processing, and analysis of meteorological data from INMET stations, including calculation of atmospheric parameters.

tools.name: mogptk
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Output Gaussian Process Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for multi-output Gaussian process modeling, providing classes for data handling, parameter interpretation, and model training.

tools.name: GPflow
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian processes library built on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A library for building Gaussian process models using TensorFlow, focusing on variational inference and scalability for modern hardware.

tools.name: GPflowOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization library based on GPflow
tools.detailed_description: A package for Bayesian Optimization built on top of GPflow, providing acquisition functions and optimization loops for black-box functions.

tools.name: Spearmint
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization codebase for machine learning algorithms
tools.detailed_description: Spearmint is a software package to perform Bayesian optimization. It is designed to automatically tune parameters of machine learning algorithms or other systems to minimize or maximize a given objective function.

tools.name: Propulate
tools.one_line_profile: Asynchronous population-based optimization for HPC
tools.detailed_description: Propulate is an asynchronous population-based optimization algorithm and software package designed for global optimization and hyperparameter search on high-performance computers (HPC).

tools.name: SustainCluster
tools.one_line_profile: Gymnasium environment for sustainable data center workload scheduling
tools.detailed_description: SustainCluster is a high-fidelity, open-source Gymnasium environment for benchmarking multi-objective, sustainable workload scheduling across geo-distributed data centers, integrating real-world AI traces and energy data.

tools.name: Active-Learning-as-a-Service
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable active learning and data selection system
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and efficient active learning and data selection system designed to facilitate the active learning process for various applications.

tools.name: AlpacaTag
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning-based crowd annotation framework for sequence tagging
tools.detailed_description: AlpacaTag is an active learning-based crowd annotation framework designed for sequence tagging tasks, facilitating efficient data labeling.

tools.name: GOPS
tools.one_line_profile: General Optimal control Problem Solver for industrial control
tools.detailed_description: General Optimal control Problem Solver (GOPS) is an easy-to-use PyTorch reinforcement learning solver package designed for industrial control problems.

tools.name: pso_global_planner
tools.one_line_profile: ROS Global Planner Plugin implementing Particle Swarm Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A ROS Global Planner Plugin that implements the Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) path planning algorithm for robotics.

tools.name: Spearmint
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization package for machine learning algorithms
tools.detailed_description: Spearmint is a package to perform Bayesian optimization according to algorithms for practical Bayesian optimization of machine learning algorithms.

tools.name: LIO_SAM_6AXIS
tools.one_line_profile: LIO-SAM system for 6-axis IMU and GNSS
tools.detailed_description: LIO_SAM for 6-axis IMU and GNSS, a system for Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) using lidar, inertial, and GPS data.

tools.name: AbstractGPs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Abstract types and methods for Gaussian Processes in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library defining abstract types and methods for Gaussian Processes, serving as a foundation for the Julia GP ecosystem.

tools.name: Stheno.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Programming with Gaussian processes in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Stheno.jl is a library for probabilistic programming with Gaussian processes in Julia, allowing for flexible model construction.

tools.name: TemporalGPs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Fast inference for Gaussian processes in time-series problems
tools.detailed_description: TemporalGPs.jl provides fast inference for Gaussian processes in problems involving time, leveraging state-space models.

tools.name: AIBECS.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for exploring global marine biogeochemical cycles
tools.detailed_description: AIBECS.jl is a Julia package designed for exploring global marine biogeochemical cycles, enabling efficient simulation and optimization of ocean models.

tools.name: gapp
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithms library in C++
tools.detailed_description: A genetic algorithms library in C++ designed for single- and multi-objective optimization tasks.

tools.name: Kriging-and-GE-Kriging-model-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Kriging and Gradient-Enhanced Kriging surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for constructing and using Kriging and Gradient-Enhanced Kriging (GE-Kriging) surrogate models for optimization and analysis.

tools.name: MultiscaleTopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: 3D multiscale topology optimization solver using surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based code for 3D multiscale topology optimization that utilizes surrogate models to predict lattice microscale responses, enabling efficient structural optimization.

tools.name: DeepSP
tools.one_line_profile: Antibody-specific surrogate model for spatial property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A CNN-based surrogate model designed to generate 30 spatial properties of antibodies solely from their sequences, serving as a feature extractor for downstream tasks.

tools.name: DeepViscosity
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for antibody viscosity classification
tools.detailed_description: An ANN model for predicting high concentration monoclonal antibody viscosity classes, utilizing spatial descriptors from the DeepSP surrogate model.

tools.name: SPI-Active
tools.one_line_profile: Active exploration framework for robot system identification
tools.detailed_description: Implements sampling-based system identification with active exploration, designed to improve Sim2Real learning for legged robots.

tools.name: NetID
tools.one_line_profile: Network optimization tool for metabolomics data annotation
tools.detailed_description: A global network optimization approach for untargeted LC-MS metabolomics data annotation and metabolite discovery.

tools.name: readfish
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive sampling tool for Oxford Nanopore sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A CLI tool enabling flexible and fast adaptive sampling on Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencers, allowing for targeted sequencing of specific DNA molecules.

tools.name: DAS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep adaptive sampling for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A deep adaptive sampling method designed to solve high-dimensional partial differential equations (PDEs) efficiently.

tools.name: MOBO
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Bayesian optimization package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing constrained and unconstrained multi-objective Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: pysur
tools.one_line_profile: Engineering surrogate modeling toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for creating surrogate models for engineering optimization tasks.

tools.name: AutoStitching
tools.one_line_profile: UAV aerial image stitching tool
tools.detailed_description: Automatic topology constructing and global stitching optimization for large-scale unordered UAV aerial images.

tools.name: ColorConsistency
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization for image color consistency
tools.detailed_description: A tool to improve color consistency across multiple images via global optimization on color remapping curves, useful for photogrammetry and mapping.

tools.name: MetaBox
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for Meta-Black-Box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking platform designed for evaluating Meta-Black-Box Optimization algorithms.

tools.name: SurrogateModelOptim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: RBF surrogate modeling package for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing radial basis function (RBF) surrogate models for use in optimization tasks.

tools.name: ALiPy
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning toolbox in Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for active learning, allowing users to evaluate, compare, and analyze the performance of various active learning methods.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO) specifically designed for Riemannian manifolds.

tools.name: OTL
tools.one_line_profile: C++ template library for multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++ template library designed to facilitate multi-objective optimization tasks.

tools.name: EAGO.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Development environment for robust and global optimization in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing a development environment for robust and global optimization, supporting deterministic global optimization of NLP and MINLP problems.

tools.name: PaddleCFD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for fluid mechanics surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit based on PaddlePaddle for surrogate modeling, equation discovery, shape optimization, and flow-control strategy discovery in fluid mechanics.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization asset for Unity simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Unity asset that integrates Bayesian optimization (via BoTorch) into Unity, enabling human-in-the-loop optimization and parameter tuning for simulations.

tools.name: MATSuMoTo
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB Surrogate Model Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for creating and using surrogate models in optimization and simulation tasks.

tools.name: Multiple Physics Pretraining
tools.one_line_profile: Pretraining framework for physical surrogate models using multiple physics sources
tools.detailed_description: A library and methodology for pretraining surrogate models on data from multiple physical systems to improve generalization and sample efficiency in scientific modeling tasks.

tools.name: pyrelational
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for active learning pipelines and strategies
tools.detailed_description: A flexible library for implementing active learning pipelines, managing data, developing models, and creating novel active learning strategies for scientific experimentation and data labeling.

tools.name: SMT
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate Modeling Toolbox for scientific and engineering applications
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing a collection of surrogate modeling methods (kriging, radial basis functions, etc.) and sampling techniques for approximating complex physical models.

tools.name: GaussianProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Processes library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Gaussian Process regression and classification, providing a flexible interface for kernel definition and inference, widely used in scientific modeling.

tools.name: Optimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified optimization package for scientific machine learning in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing a unified interface for various optimization algorithms (local, global, gradient-based, derivative-free), essential for fitting scientific models and solving inverse problems.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for building surrogate models (kriging, random forests, neural networks) of complex scientific simulations to accelerate optimization and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: GPmat
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab implementation of Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab library for Gaussian Process modeling, providing tools for regression, classification, and dimensionality reduction in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: GPy
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process framework in Python
tools.detailed_description: A mature Python library for Gaussian Process modeling, widely used in bioinformatics, physics, and engineering for probabilistic modeling and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: GPyOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization library using GPy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian Optimization based on GPy, designed for optimizing black-box functions in scientific experiments and model hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: PyDeepGP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Gaussian Processes library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Deep Gaussian Processes, enabling hierarchical probabilistic modeling for complex scientific datasets.

tools.name: Gradient-Free-Optimizers
tools.one_line_profile: Library for gradient-free optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A collection of gradient-free optimization techniques (local, global, population-based) suitable for optimizing discrete search spaces and black-box scientific functions.

tools.name: deepALplus
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Deep Active Learning
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox extending deep active learning capabilities, providing strategies for efficient data labeling in deep learning workflows.

tools.name: shgo
tools.one_line_profile: Simplicial Homology Global Optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SHGO algorithm for global optimization, suitable for solving complex black-box optimization problems in scientific computing (integrated into SciPy).

tools.name: Moo-GBT
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization in Gradient Boosted Trees
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing multi-objective optimization using Gradient Boosted Trees, useful for optimizing multiple conflicting objectives in data-driven scientific design.

tools.name: Equi7Grid
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial reference system for global high-resolution raster data
tools.detailed_description: A definition and tool for the Equi7Grid spatial reference system, optimized for handling and analyzing global high-resolution raster data in earth sciences and remote sensing.

tools.name: l4casadi
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of PyTorch models with CasADi for optimization
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling the use of PyTorch neural networks within CasADi graphs, facilitating learning-based optimal control and data-driven optimization in engineering and physics.

tools.name: HEROS
tools.one_line_profile: Supervised rule-based machine learning algorithm for interpretable modeling
tools.detailed_description: The Heuristic Evolutionary Rule Optimization System (HEROS) is a scikit-learn compatible machine learning algorithm designed to model diverse structured data problems and yield compact, human-interpretable solutions, suitable for scientific discovery where interpretability is key.

tools.name: Nextorch
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental design and Bayesian optimization library for chemical sciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python/PyTorch library for experimental design and Bayesian optimization, specifically tailored for applications in chemical engineering and materials science to accelerate discovery and optimization processes.

tools.name: Vowpal Wabbit
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance machine learning system for active and interactive learning
tools.detailed_description: A fast, out-of-core machine learning system that implements advanced techniques such as online learning, active learning, and contextual bandits, widely used for large-scale adaptive experimental design and decision making.

tools.name: DrugEx
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for de novo drug design with multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit designed for de novo drug design, integrating Pareto-based multi-objective optimization to generate molecules that satisfy multiple pharmacological constraints simultaneously.

tools.name: MOE
tools.one_line_profile: Global black-box optimization engine for experimental design
tools.detailed_description: A global, black-box optimization engine (Metric Optimization Engine) designed for optimizing real-world metrics through Bayesian optimization and Gaussian Processes, suitable for experimental design and parameter tuning.

tools.name: BADS
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Adaptive Direct Search optimization algorithm for model fitting
tools.detailed_description: A fast Bayesian optimization algorithm designed for model fitting and parameter estimation, particularly effective for difficult, non-analytical, and noisy objective functions common in computational neuroscience and biology.

tools.name: PyBADS
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Bayesian Adaptive Direct Search for model fitting
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of the BADS algorithm, providing a robust solver for black-box optimization problems and model fitting tasks in scientific research.

tools.name: PyDL8.5
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning optimal decision trees
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for learning optimal decision trees, providing exact solutions for interpretable machine learning models, which are crucial for scientific discovery and reasoning.

tools.name: Bayex
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Bayesian optimization library in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A minimal yet efficient implementation of Bayesian Optimization using JAX, enabling hardware-accelerated optimization for scientific simulations and machine learning hyperparameters.

tools.name: Keras GP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Kernel Learning library combining Keras and Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A library that extends Keras with Gaussian Process layers, enabling scalable Deep Kernel Learning for probabilistic modeling and Bayesian optimization in high-dimensional scientific data.

tools.name: Phoenics
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization tool for efficient experiment planning
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian optimization tool designed for chemistry and materials science, enabling efficient experiment planning and autonomous discovery by optimizing complex objective functions.

tools.name: ASReview
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning tool for systematic reviews
tools.detailed_description: A framework that uses active learning to accelerate the process of screening abstracts and titles for systematic reviews, significantly reducing the workload for researchers.

tools.name: moo
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm and multi-objective optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Haskell providing binary and continuous genetic algorithms, including multi-objective optimization algorithms like NSGA-II.

tools.name: RoBO
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Bayesian Optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Bayesian optimization that includes various acquisition functions and model types, designed for robust optimization of black-box functions.

tools.name: SMAC3
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Bayesian Optimization package for Hyperparameter Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A robust and versatile tool for Bayesian Optimization, widely used for hyperparameter optimization (HPO) and algorithm configuration in scientific computing and ML.

tools.name: biteopt
tools.one_line_profile: Derivative-free global optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A stochastic derivative-free global optimization method for continuous and discrete problems, suitable for black-box optimization tasks.

tools.name: EDBO
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for chemists and biologists to optimize experimental conditions and chemical reactions using Bayesian Optimization.

tools.name: Baal
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian active learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Bayesian active learning, providing methods to estimate uncertainty and select data points for labeling to improve model performance efficiently.

tools.name: Black-it
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box calibration kit for Agent-Based Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calibrating Agent-Based Models (ABMs) using black-box optimization techniques, developed by the Bank of Italy.

tools.name: surmise
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and calibration interface
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating surrogate models (emulators) that interface with calibration tools, facilitating uncertainty quantification in scientific modeling.

tools.name: BOCS
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization of Combinatorial Structures
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for Bayesian Optimization over discrete/combinatorial search spaces, useful for structural optimization tasks.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization with Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A popular pure Python implementation of Bayesian Optimization using Gaussian Processes, widely used for optimizing black-box functions.

tools.name: SafeOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Safe Bayesian Optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SafeOpt algorithm for Bayesian Optimization under safety constraints, ensuring exploration does not violate safety thresholds.

tools.name: blackboxopt
tools.one_line_profile: Common interface for blackbox optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a unified interface for various black-box optimization algorithms, facilitating benchmarking and deployment of optimization loops.

tools.name: NNGP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network kernel for Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing the Gaussian Process kernel corresponding to infinitely wide deep neural networks, used for theoretical analysis and modeling.

tools.name: torch-dngo
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Network for Global Optimization (DNGO)
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of DNGO, a Bayesian Optimization method that uses deep neural networks to estimate uncertainty and guide optimization.

tools.name: CellOT
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell perturbation response prediction using Optimal Transport
tools.detailed_description: A framework for learning single-cell perturbation responses using Neural Optimal Transport, enabling the prediction of cellular states under different conditions.

tools.name: Simple
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental Global Optimization Algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the 'Simple' global optimization algorithm designed for expensive black-box functions, aiming for efficiency in high-dimensional spaces.

tools.name: cnn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Bayesian deep convolutional encoder-decoder networks designed for surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification in scientific simulations.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-dimensional surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using physics-constrained deep learning.

tools.name: MetaOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel black-box function optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing black-box functions in parallel, suitable for hyperparameter tuning and other expensive optimization tasks.

tools.name: GPdoemd
tools.one_line_profile: Design of experiments library using Gaussian process surrogate models for model discrimination
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for optimal experimental design (OED) specifically focused on model discrimination tasks. It utilizes Gaussian Process surrogate models to efficiently select experiments that best distinguish between competing physical or biological models.

tools.name: entmoot
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective black-box optimization using gradient-boosted trees
tools.detailed_description: A framework for optimizing black-box functions, particularly suitable for multi-objective problems. It leverages gradient-boosted tree models (like LightGBM or XGBoost) as surrogates within a Bayesian Optimization-like loop to guide the search for optimal solutions.

tools.name: rbfopt
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library using Radial Basis Functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for black-box optimization of continuous functions, utilizing Radial Basis Function (RBF) interpolation as a surrogate model. It is designed to handle expensive-to-evaluate functions and requires no derivative information.

tools.name: molpal
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning software for accelerated virtual screening in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Pool Active Learning (MolPAL) is a tool designed to accelerate high-throughput virtual screening. It employs active learning strategies to iteratively select and evaluate small batches of molecules, training a surrogate model to predict properties of a large library without exhaustive screening.

tools.name: CORELS
tools.one_line_profile: Certifiably Optimal Rule Lists for interpretable machine learning
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm and library for learning certifiably optimal rule lists. It provides interpretable models for classification tasks, often used in scientific domains like medicine and criminology where transparency is critical.

tools.name: GPyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Highly efficient Gaussian Processes library built on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A Gaussian Process library implemented in PyTorch, designed for scalability and flexibility. It enables the use of GPs for large datasets and integrates seamlessly with deep learning workflows, serving as a core component for many Bayesian Optimization and active learning frameworks.

tools.name: EPOSearch
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for finding Exact Pareto Optimal solutions in multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the EPOS (Exact Pareto Optimal Search) algorithm. It is designed for preference-based multi-objective optimization, allowing researchers to find solutions that balance multiple conflicting objectives according to specific preferences.

tools.name: DISTIL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Diversified Interactive Learning library for active learning
tools.detailed_description: DISTIL is an active learning library built on PyTorch. It provides implementations of various active learning strategies (e.g., uncertainty sampling, diversity sampling) to select the most informative data points for labeling, thereby reducing annotation costs in scientific machine learning tasks.

tools.name: celerite
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable 1D Gaussian Process regression library
tools.detailed_description: A library for fast and scalable Gaussian Process regression in one dimension. It is widely used in astrophysics (e.g., exoplanet transit modeling) and other fields for time-series analysis where standard GP implementations are too slow.

tools.name: george
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and flexible Gaussian Process regression library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Gaussian Process regression, designed to be fast and user-friendly. It provides a flexible interface for defining kernels and performing inference, suitable for scientific data analysis and modeling.

tools.name: tinygp
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Gaussian Process library built on JAX
tools.detailed_description: A tiny, pure Python/JAX library for Gaussian Processes. It leverages JAX for automatic differentiation and compilation, making it highly efficient for building custom GP models and integrating them into larger differentiable programming workflows.

tools.name: surrkick
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate models for predicting black-hole kicks
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides surrogate models for predicting the recoil kicks of black holes resulting from binary mergers. It is based on numerical relativity simulations and allows for fast evaluation of kick velocities in astrophysical studies.

tools.name: CbAS
tools.one_line_profile: Conditioning by Adaptive Sampling for robust design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Conditioning by Adaptive Sampling (CbAS) algorithm. This method is used for robust design in high-dimensional spaces, such as protein sequence design, by iteratively training generative models on re-weighted samples to satisfy desired properties.

tools.name: fast-cma-es
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Python implementation of CMA-ES optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient Python implementation of the Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy (CMA-ES), a popular gradient-free optimization algorithm used for continuous non-convex optimization problems.

tools.name: ipp-rl
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Adaptive Informative Path Planning
tools.detailed_description: A library/framework for Adaptive Informative Path Planning (IPP) using Deep Reinforcement Learning. It is designed for active sensing tasks, such as UAV-based data collection, where the agent must autonomously decide measurement locations to maximize information gain.

tools.name: EDBO+
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian reaction optimization tool for chemical synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian optimization platform specifically designed for chemical reaction optimization, facilitating the discovery of optimal synthesis conditions.

tools.name: Dragonfly
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian optimisation library
tools.detailed_description: An open source Python library for scalable Bayesian optimization, designed to handle high-dimensional parameter spaces and multi-fidelity evaluations.

tools.name: libcluster
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library of Hierarchical Bayesian clustering algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An extensible library implementing Hierarchical Bayesian clustering algorithms including Bayesian GMMs and variational Dirichlet processes for statistical analysis.

tools.name: relax
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient estimation optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for optimizing control variates for black-box gradient estimation, useful in probabilistic programming and machine learning inference.

tools.name: Deep Active Learning
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark library for deep active learning algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive implementation and benchmarking library for various deep active learning strategies and algorithms.

tools.name: Axon

tools.detailed_description: A high-level neural network library for Elixir, powered by Nx, enabling scientific modeling and deep learning in the Elixir ecosystem.

tools.name: BayBE

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian Optimization and Design of Experiments (DoE), focusing on chemical and materials science applications.

tools.name: edibble

tools.detailed_description: An R package that encapsulates elements of experimental design to facilitate better planning, management, and workflow of scientific experiments.

tools.name: pagmo

tools.detailed_description: A C++ platform to perform parallel computations of optimisation tasks (global and local) via the asynchronous generalized island model, developed by ESA.

tools.name: pagmo2

tools.detailed_description: The second version of the pagmo library, providing a C++ platform for parallel global and local optimization using the island model.

tools.name: pygmo2

tools.detailed_description: Python interface for the pagmo2 C++ optimization library, enabling parallel global and local optimization in Python.

tools.detailed_description: A visual-inertial mapping framework for creating, processing, and manipulating multi-session maps, widely used in robotics research.

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for solving multi-objective optimization problems, developed at ETH Zurich.

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies black-box hyperparameter optimization by providing a unified interface to various backend optimizers.

tools.detailed_description: A framework for experimental design and multi-objective Bayesian optimization, tailored for scientific experiments.

tools.detailed_description: A library combining tree-boosting with Gaussian process and mixed effects models, useful for probabilistic modeling and spatial statistics.

tools.detailed_description: A tool for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics and perception research, built on top of gpytorch and botorch.

tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for implementing flow matching algorithms, a class of generative models increasingly used in scientific modeling (e.g., protein design).

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package providing general-purpose MCMC and SMC samplers and tools for Bayesian statistics, facilitating inference and parameter estimation.

tools.detailed_description: Provides a solver for multi-objective optimization problems using Multiple Gradient Descent Algorithm (MGDA), widely used as a reference implementation for gradient-based multi-objective optimization in machine learning tasks.

tools.detailed_description: A global optimization solver built on Julia and JuMP, designed to solve non-convex mathematical programs with a focus on reliability and performance in scientific computing contexts.

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to perform active learning for training machine-learned interatomic potentials, facilitating efficient data acquisition in materials science simulations.

tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to make active learning easier for real-world users. It provides a pool-based active learning framework with various query strategies to improve data efficiency in machine learning tasks.

tools.detailed_description: The COCO (COmparing Continuous Optimizers) framework provides a platform for benchmarking and comparing numerical black-box optimization algorithms. It includes test suites, post-processing facilities, and data formats for rigorous performance evaluation.

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for evaluating Large Multi-modality Models (LMMs). It supports over 220 models and 80 benchmarks, facilitating the assessment of model performance across various multimodal tasks.

tools.detailed_description: A C++ framework for single and multi-objective optimization problems. It implements classic metaheuristics (GA, SA, Tabu Search, NSGA-II) and supports hyperheuristics, providing a flexible structure for solving combinatorial optimization problems.

tools.name: kurobako

tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and library for benchmarking black-box optimization algorithms. It allows users to define problems and solvers and measure their performance, facilitating the development and comparison of optimization strategies.

tools.name: yabox

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for black-box optimization, focusing on simplicity and ease of use. It implements algorithms like Differential Evolution and is designed to optimize expensive or noisy functions without gradient information.

tools.name: blackbox

tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python module designed for optimizing expensive black-box functions. It supports parallel execution and provides a simple interface for users to minimize functions where evaluations are costly.

tools.name: ncpol2sdpa

tools.detailed_description: A library to solve global polynomial optimization problems (commutative or noncommutative) by converting them into semidefinite programming (SDP) relaxations. It helps in analyzing quantum correlations and other physics problems.

tools.name: MOBOpt

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Multi-Objective Bayesian Optimization. It enables the optimization of multiple conflicting objectives simultaneously using Gaussian Processes and various acquisition functions.

tools.name: BOPP

tools.detailed_description: A Clojure library for Bayesian Optimization applied to probabilistic programs. It allows for the optimization of parameters within probabilistic models, integrating with the probabilistic programming ecosystem.

tools.name: adaptive

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for adaptive sampling of mathematical functions. It uses active learning techniques to recommend the next points to evaluate, optimizing the sampling process for plotting, integration, or other analysis of expensive functions.

tools.name: btrack

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian multi-object tracking, widely used in cell biology and microscopy to track cells over time. It uses Kalman filters and optimization to link detections into trajectories.

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework developed by RadiaSoft for configuring and executing large-scale black-box optimization problems, particularly for scientific simulations (e.g., particle accelerators). It interfaces with various simulation codes and optimization libraries.

tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive and User-friendly Active Learning Library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a comprehensive collection of active learning algorithms, designed to be user-friendly and compatible with the scikit-learn ecosystem.

tools.name: scikit-learn
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning in Python
tools.detailed_description: The premier machine learning library for Python, providing simple and efficient tools for predictive data analysis, including classification, regression, clustering, and dimensionality reduction.

tools.name: scikit-optimize
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential model-based optimization with a scipy.optimize interface
tools.detailed_description: A library for sequential model-based optimization (SMBO) in Python, providing an interface similar to scipy.optimize, suitable for hyperparameter optimization and black-box optimization.

tools.name: trieste
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian optimization library built on TensorFlow, designed for optimizing expensive black-box objective functions with a focus on scalability and flexibility.

tools.name: TikTak
tools.one_line_profile: Multistart global optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of the TikTak multistart global optimization algorithm, designed for finding global optima in complex landscapes.

tools.name: evalset
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite of test functions for black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a suite of benchmark test functions suitable for evaluating and comparing black-box optimization strategies.

tools.name: MPOPIS
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive importance sampling modification to Model Predictive Path Integral (MPPI) control
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of an adaptive importance sampling modification to the MPPI algorithm, useful for optimal control and trajectory optimization in dynamic systems.

tools.name: interactive-gp-visualization
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive tool for visualizing Gaussian Processes, aiding in the understanding and debugging of GP models used in Bayesian Optimization.

tools.name: ADASYN
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Synthetic Sampling Approach for Imbalanced Learning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ADASYN algorithm for generating synthetic data samples to handle imbalanced datasets, useful in scientific data preprocessing.

tools.name: nlopt
tools.one_line_profile: Library for nonlinear optimization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for nonlinear optimization, wrapping many algorithms for global and local, constrained or unconstrained optimization.

tools.name: evolutionary-optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of evolutionary black-box optimizers
tools.detailed_description: A Python collection of black-box optimization algorithms with a focus on evolutionary strategies, suitable for optimizing complex scientific functions.

tools.name: dmpbbo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Dynamical Movement Primitives and Black-Box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++/Python library combining Dynamical Movement Primitives (DMP) with Black-Box Optimization (BBO), designed for robotics and control tasks.

tools.name: greattunes
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly Bayesian Optimization library wrapping GPyTorch and BoTorch
tools.detailed_description: An easy-to-use Python library for Bayesian Optimization handling continuous, categorical, and integer variables, built on top of GPyTorch and BoTorch.

tools.name: gwsurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to gravitational wave surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing an easy-to-use interface for evaluating surrogate models of gravitational waveforms, used in astrophysics simulations.

tools.name: tea-lang
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for experimental design and statistical analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Domain Specific Language (DSL) designed to facilitate experimental design and statistical analysis, automating the translation of high-level designs into statistical tests.

tools.name: AugmentedGaussianProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process package based on data augmentation and sparsity
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Gaussian Processes that leverages data augmentation, sparsity, and natural gradients for efficient inference.

tools.name: MetaSklearn
tools.one_line_profile: Metaheuristic-Powered Hyperparameter Optimization Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for hyperparameter optimization of Scikit-Learn models using metaheuristic algorithms.

tools.name: GPJax
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian processes in JAX and Flax
tools.detailed_description: A library for Gaussian Processes built on JAX and Flax, enabling hardware-accelerated and differentiable GP modeling.

tools.name: bayesian-optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Bayesian Optimization using Gaussian Processes, suitable for optimizing black-box functions.

tools.name: QuadDIRECT.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization without derivatives in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing the DIRECT algorithm for global optimization without derivatives, suitable for black-box functions.

tools.name: random-fourier-features
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of random Fourier features for kernel methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Random Fourier Features (RFF) for approximating kernel methods like SVMs and Gaussian Processes, enabling scalable modeling.

tools.name: Test Functions for Multi-objective Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of test functions for benchmarking multi-objective optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library providing standard test functions to evaluate and benchmark the performance of multi-objective optimization algorithms, essential for developing new optimization strategies.

tools.name: COMBO
tools.one_line_profile: Common Bayesian Optimization library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian optimization, designed to efficiently find the optimal solution of black-box functions, widely used in material informatics and hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: Bayesmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Bayesian optimization methods
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to easily compare and benchmark different Bayesian optimization methods on real-world machine learning tasks and datasets.

tools.name: MOLTO-IT
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Objective Low-Thrust Optimizer for Interplanetary Transfers
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for optimizing low-thrust interplanetary trajectories using multi-objective optimization techniques, aiding in mission design and astrodynamics.

tools.name: Gibbs
tools.one_line_profile: Library for equilibrium calculation via Gibbs free energy minimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating chemical equilibrium by minimizing global Gibbs free energy, useful for thermodynamic modeling and phase equilibrium studies.

tools.name: Benderopt
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for black-box optimization, supporting various algorithms to optimize objective functions that are expensive to evaluate, suitable for hyperparameter tuning and experimental design.

tools.name: H_Kriging
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Kriging model implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Hierarchical Kriging, a variable-fidelity surrogate modeling technique used to combine data from different sources (e.g., high and low fidelity simulations) for efficient modeling.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization algorithms with recent improvements
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various Bayesian Optimization algorithms, focusing on efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions.

tools.name: MIP-EGO
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed-Integer Parallel Efficient Global Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the MIP-EGO algorithm for solving mixed-integer global optimization problems using surrogate models.

tools.name: Pontryagin-Differentiable-Programming
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end learning and control framework
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework for learning control objective functions, dynamics, and policies using Pontryagin's Maximum Principle and differentiable programming, applicable to robotic control and dynamic systems.

tools.name: small-text
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning library for text classification
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing state-of-the-art active learning strategies for text classification, facilitating efficient data labeling and model training in NLP-heavy scientific workflows (e.g., literature mining).

tools.name: EasySurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating surrogate models of multiscale systems
tools.detailed_description: Part of the VECMA toolkit, this library facilitates the creation and deployment of surrogate models for complex multiscale simulations, enabling efficient uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: gpar
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process Autoregressive Regression Model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Gaussian Process Autoregressive Regression (GPAR) model, useful for modeling multi-output functions and time series in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: stheno
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian process modelling library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Gaussian process modeling, providing a flexible interface for defining and composing kernels and mean functions for probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: Go-RIO
tools.one_line_profile: Ground-Optimized 4D Radar-Inertial Odometry
tools.detailed_description: A system for Radar-Inertial Odometry using Continuous Velocity Integration and Gaussian Processes, providing robust state estimation for robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: Cornell-MOE
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal Learning and Bayesian Optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python/C++ library for Bayesian Optimization (Optimal Learning), implementing efficient algorithms for global optimization of expensive functions, originally developed at Cornell.

tools.name: Wasserstein-Learning-For-Point-Process
tools.one_line_profile: Learning point processes via optimal transport
tools.detailed_description: A library/solver for learning point processes using optimal transport and Wasserstein distance, applicable to modeling event sequences in various scientific domains.

tools.name: rBayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization of Hyperparameters in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Bayesian Optimization of hyperparameters, enabling efficient global optimization of black-box functions within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: YCML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning and Optimization framework for Objective-C
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Machine Learning and Optimization implemented in Objective-C, providing tools for numerical optimization and modeling on macOS/iOS platforms.

tools.name: Probabilistic-density-network
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning paradigm for fuzzy design of functional metastructures
tools.detailed_description: A probability-density-based deep learning framework designed for the inverse design of functional metastructures, published in AAAS and NeurIPS ML4PS.

tools.name: GO-SLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Global Optimization for Consistent 3D Instant Reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based SLAM system for real-time 3D reconstruction and camera tracking, focusing on global consistency.

tools.name: MI-AOD
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Instance Active Learning for Object Detection
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Multiple Instance Active Learning for Object Detection, providing a framework for selecting informative samples to label in detection tasks.

tools.name: AutoOED
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Optimal Experimental Design Platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for automated optimal experimental design, facilitating the optimization of experiments through machine learning and optimization algorithms.

tools.name: DGEMO
tools.one_line_profile: Diversity-Guided Efficient Multi-Objective Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A multi-objective optimization algorithm designed for batch evaluations, emphasizing diversity to improve efficiency in finding Pareto fronts.

tools.name: CogVLM2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source multi-modal model based on Llama3
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art open-source large multi-modal model capable of visual question answering and image understanding, useful for scientific image analysis.

tools.name: ANS-GT
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Graph Transformer with Adaptive Node Sampling
tools.detailed_description: A graph transformer model featuring adaptive node sampling for efficient hierarchical graph representation learning.

tools.name: GlORIE-SLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Globally Optimized RGB-only Implicit Encoding Point Cloud SLAM
tools.detailed_description: A SLAM system that uses implicit encoding for point clouds and global optimization to achieve consistent RGB-only 3D reconstruction.

tools.name: Max-value-Entropy-Search
tools.one_line_profile: Max-value Entropy Search for Efficient Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Max-value Entropy Search (MES) acquisition function for efficient Bayesian Optimization.

tools.name: gpax
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Processes for Experimental Sciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Gaussian Processes built on NumPyro and JAX, specifically tailored for experimental sciences and physics-based machine learning.

tools.name: rembo
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization in high-dimensions via random embedding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of REMBO (Random EMbedding Bayesian Optimization) for performing Bayesian optimization in high-dimensional spaces.

tools.name: GLEAM
tools.one_line_profile: Learning Generalizable Exploration Policy for Active Mapping
tools.detailed_description: A framework for learning generalizable exploration policies for active mapping in complex 3D indoor scenes, relevant to robotics and autonomous data collection.

tools.name: lentil
tools.one_line_profile: Polynomial optics shader for Arnold renderer
tools.detailed_description: A camera shader for the Arnold renderer that uses polynomial optics to simulate high-order optical aberrations for realistic imaging simulation.
